content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We recommend starting your work with EPAM Cloud with visiting its website at\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://cloud.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://cloud.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". The website contains a wealth of useful information, feature descriptions, guidelines and instructions, tips and hints. The website also includes a comprehensive Cloud library containing documentation describing all aspects of Cloud usage.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To access the Cloud Management Console, click 'Sign in' on the\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://cloud.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Cloud home page\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Use your EPAM domain credentials or SSO authentication to log in. You can access EPAM Cloud Web UI both from within the EPAM network and from outside.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Note: all EPAM employees with valid credentials have access to the Cloud Management Console. At the same time, only the users with activated projects can access the complete EPAM Orchestrator functionality, within the scope of their permissions. If your project has not been activated in Cloud, you will be able to retrieve some basic Orchestrator metrics and activate your personal project.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/307a9a7b-c096-4066-8832-d62dc125cf49/image2016-12-6%2016:38:7.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":651,\"height\":358}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(26, 156, 176)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
